title.rendered: 7 Reasons small businesses should consider Delhivery SME’s logistics and supply chain management

content.rendered:
Since our inception in 2011, Delhivery has become a leading logistics and supply chain services company in India. We have had the pleasure of working with some of the largest ecommerce companies in the country. Our vision is to become the operating system for commerce in India. This includes not only the big names, but also the small and medium enterprises (SMEs), who are a significant part of our economy.

To bring ecommerce-grade logistics and supply chain management to every small business in India, we designed Delhivery SME.

If you’re a small business owner selling your products online, here are seven reasons you should consider partnering with Delhivery now!

#1 DELHIVERY OPERATES ONE OF THE FASTEST EXPRESS PARCEL TRANSPORTATION NETWORKS IN INDIA

We have fulfilled over a billion orders (and counting) across 17000+ pin codes. We have 80+ fulfilment centres and 2235 self-operated delivery centres across the country.

With Delhivery SME, no part of India is beyond your reach.

#2 WE TAKE YOUR PRODUCTS TO THE WORLD

Delhivery SME can enable you to sell your products across the globe. As part of Starfleet, a global alliance of logistics companies, we have the capability to ship your products by air or sea cargo. We also offer international warehouse management at competitive rates.

With Delhivery SME, the world is indeed your oyster.

#3 WE GUARANTEE SAFE AND RELIABLE SHIPPING

Whether your business sells intricate handicraft or large furniture, high-value art pieces or even hazardous chemicals, we offer safe, warehouse and freight facilities for your products.

We make sure it’s delivered in impeccable condition.

#4 WE OFFER FLEXIBLE, SAME-DAY, NEXT-DAY DELIVERY OPTIONS

When you partner with Delivery, you can offer same-day or next-day delivery options to your customers across the country. We can also handle flexible shipping schedules, where the product is delivered to the customer’s doorstep at a pre-defined time.

We make our services adaptable to your needs.

#5 WE TAKE CARE OF END-TO-END LOGISTICS AND SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT

We are not just a courier company. Delhivery is, in fact, an end-to-end logistics and supply chain management company. We offer first-mile pick up from your doorstep, packaging, shipping, warehouse management, last-mile delivery, cash on delivery, returns management and refunds.

Delhivery is the only logistics partner you’ll ever need.

#6 WE EMPOWER YOU WITH DATA SCIENCE CAPABILITIES

We understand that order fulfilment is only one part of running a business. Your long-term growth will come from having complete visibility, enabling you to observe trends and make predictions. This is exactly what Delhivery’s data science capabilities endeavour to do. Our dashboards offer complete visibility of your orders — where it is, where it’s going, how much it costs, who is returning, and so on.

Delhivery ensures you understand your business clearly.

#7 OUR CONTACT CENTRE IS OPEN 24X7

Our customer care teams will answer your questions and address your concerns whenever you need.

Delhivery cares for you 24×7.

CHOOSE DELHIVERY SME

Being a small business, competing with the big players in a pandemic-affected market can be a huge challenge. At Delhivery, we want to make it as easy as we can for you. So, we have packaged our ecommerce-grade logistics and supply chain management solution to meet your unique needs.

Give your business the Delhivery advantage. Speak to our consultant today.
